panels.description:
BUSY_TIME: Number of hundredths of a second that a processor has been busy executing user or kernel code, totalled over all processors

IO_WAIT_TIME: Number of hundredths of a second that a processor has been waiting for I/O to complete, totalled over all processors

SYS_TIME: Number of hundredths of a second that a processor has been busy executing kernel code, totalled over all processors

USER_TIME: Number of hundredths of a second that a processor has been busy executing user code, totalled over all processors

NICE_TIME: Number of hundredths of a second that a processor has been busy executing low-priority user code, totalled over all processors
panels.title: CPU Usage

links.title: V$SGASTAT displays detailed information on the system global area (SGA).

panels.title: Total Physical Read/Write IO Request Rate
System: Amount of time spent in the wait class

panels.description: Seconds spent in the current wait condition
panels.title: Session: Amount of time spent in the wait class

panels.description: Number of processes running or waiting on the run queue
panels.title: Process Load

title: Oracle App-Specific -- Database System Level - v1.1
